updated_cases.title: Verify page events when referrer URL is not categorized but host URL is categorized
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify page events when referrer URL is not categorized but host URL is categorized
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Access a URL which is categorized but referrer URL is uncategorized
2. Check page event category
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. Valid category should be seen in application category
2. "Uncategorized" should not be seen

updated_cases.title: Verify page events when both referrer and host URL are categorized
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify page events when both referrer and host URL are categorized
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Access a URL with referrer such that both the host URL and referrer URL are categorized
2. Check page event category
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. Valid categories (categories derived from referrer URL) should be seen in application cateogry
2. "Uncategorized" should not be seen

updated_cases.title: Verify predefined category is also displayed with custom category in block template
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify predefined category is also displayed with custom category in block template
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Create a custom category by selecting predefined category(eg. Fashion) and name the custom category as test1
Create an Inline policy by selecting the category test1 and and alert type as block
Enable Client and try to access some fashion site
updated_cases.custom_expected: The Block template sholud be displayed to the user with categories "test1" and Fashion.

updated_cases.title: Verify all related categories are  displayed in block template with inclusions
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify all related categories are  displayed in block template with inclusions
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Create two url lists : "list1" with url cnn.com and "list2" with foxnews.com
Create a custom category by selecting predefined category(eg. Search engine) , inclusion list  as list1 and exclusion list as list2 and name the category as "test1"
Create an Inline policy by selecting the category test1 and and alert type as block
Enable Client and try to access www.google.com
updated_cases.custom_expected:
The user should be displayed with a block tempalte with categories:
"test1" and "Search Engine"

updated_cases.title: Verify categories on block template
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Create two url lists : "list1" with url cnn.com and "list2" with foxnews.com
Create a custom category by selecting predefined category(eg. Search engine) , inclusion list  as list1 and exclusion list as list2 and name the category as "test1"
Create an Inline policy by selecting the category test1 and alert type as block
Enable Client and try to access www.cnn.com
updated_cases.custom_expected:
The user should be displayed with a block tempalte with categories:
"test1"

updated_cases.title: Verify block template for a policy with custom and predefined categories
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify block template for a policy with custom and predefined categories
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Create two url lists : "list1" with url cnn.com and "list2" with foxnews.com
Create a custom category by selecting predefined category(eg. Search engine) , inclusion list  as list1 and exclusion list as list2 and name the category as "test1"
Create an Inline policy by selecting the category test1 and predefined category "Webmail" and alert type as block
Enable Client and try to access www.gmail.com
updated_cases.custom_expected:
The user should be displayed with a block tempalte with categories:
"Webmail"

updated_cases.title: Verify block template for a policy with custom category hitting exclusions
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify block template for a policy with custom category hitting exclusions
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Create two url lists : "list1" with url cnn.com and "list2" with foxnews.com
Create a custom category by selecting predefined category(eg. Search engine) , inclusion list  as list1 and exclusion list as list2 and name the category as "test1"
Create an Inline policy by selecting the category test1 and alert type as block
Enable Client and try to access www.foxnews.com
updated_cases.custom_expected: The user should be  allowed to access site as foxnews comes under exclusion list.

updated_cases.title: Verify User alert for a policy with custom and predefined categories
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify User alert for a policy with custom and predefined categories
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Create two url lists : "list1" with url cnn.com and "list2" with foxnews.com
Create a custom category by selecting predefined category(eg. Search engine) , inclusion list  as list1 and exclusion list as list2 and name the category as "test1"
Create an Inline policy by selecting the category test1 and alert type as User alert
Enable Client and try to access www.google.com
updated_cases.custom_expected:
The user should be displayed with a user tempalte with categories:
"test1" and "Search Engine"

updated_cases.title: Verify User alert for a policy with custom categories inclusion/exclusion
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify User alert for a policy with custom categories inclusion/exclusion
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Create two url lists : "list1" with url cnn.com and "list2" with amazon.com
Create a custom category by selecting predefined categories(eg. Search engine,social,shopping) , inclusion list  as list1 and exclusion list as list2 and name the category as "test1"
Create an Inline policy1 by selecting the category shopping,activity-browse and alert type as User alert

Create an Inline policy2 by selecting the category social,activity-login and alert type as User alert

Create an Inline policy3 by selecting the category search engine,activity-browse and alert type as User alert

1. Enable client and access ebay.com

2. try accessing amazon.com

3. Try to loginto facebook.com

4. Try to access google.com.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. The user should be displayed with a user templale with categories:
"shopping" and "test1" 

2. The user should not be displayed any user alert as amazon.com is in exclusion list

3. The user should be displayed with a user templale with categories:
"social" and "test1" 

4. The user should be displayed with a user templale with categories:
"search engine" and "test1"

updated_cases.title: Verify User alert for a policy with custom categories
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify User alert for a policy with custom categories
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Create a user alert template with policy,activity ,application and category name and name as "template1".
Create two url lists :  ""list1"" with youtube.com
Create a custom category by selecting predefined category(eg. webmail) , inclusion list  as list1 and name the category as ""test1""
Create an Inline policy by selecting the category test1,activity as browse and alert type as User alert-with template1
Enable Client and try to access Enable Client and try to access www.youtube.com
updated_cases.custom_expected:
The user should be displayed with a user templale with the following:
<policy-name>,Browse, youtube, test1
